com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.base

Interface DynamicScrollableWidget

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DynamicWidget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicListView, DynamicNavigationView, DynamicNestedListView, DynamicNestedScrollView, DynamicRecyclerView, DynamicScrollView

    public interface DynamicScrollableWidget
extends DynamicWidget
    Interface to create dynamic widgets with a scroll bar according to the DynamicTheme.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      int getScrollBarColorType() 
      void setColor(boolean setScrollBarColor)
      Set color and scroll bar color of this view at once.
      void setScrollBarColor()
      Set scroll bar color of this view according to the supplied values.
      void setScrollBarColor(int scrollBarColor)
      Set the value of scroll bar color for this view.
      void setScrollBarColorType(int scrollBarColorType)
      Set the scroll bar color type to this view.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.base.DynamicWidget

        getColor, getColorType, getContrastWithColor, getContrastWithColorType, initialize, isBackgroundAware, loadFromAttributes, setBackgroundAware, setColor, setColor, setColorType, setContrastWithColor, setContrastWithColorType, setEnabled

        Returns:

      • setColor

        Set color and scroll bar color of this view at once.
